short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add dynamic analysis to chess.com to boost your training, refine your strategies and improve your skills in no time !

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unleash your inner grandmaster with the ultimate real-time chess training app designed to work on your favorite game platform. Whether youâ€™re a beginner looking to learn the basics or an advanced player aiming to refine your strategies, we offers a dynamic and interactive move-by-move review. 

We are still in beta development !! 

Feature available in the current version:
- Suggest the best move
- Show the best response to it
- Show the best move in retrospect so you can learn by your mistakes.

Much more feature to come:
- Analysis full lines in real-time
- Real-time eval bar
- General info about your opening and moves
- Save all your game and review later
- Track your progressions
Stay Tune !
